thread.title: EU court rules that Bitcoin exchanges don’t have to pay taxes
thread.title_full: EU court rules that Bitcoin exchanges don’t have to pay taxes - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: EU court rules that Bitcoin exchanges don’t have to pay taxes
text: BRUSSELS (Reuters) – Exchanging traditional currency for the digital currency bitcoinonline should be exempt from consumption taxes just like other transactions of banknotes and coins, the European Court of Justice said on Thursday. Europe’s highest court ruled in response to a request by Swedish tax authorities, who had argued bitcoin transactions should not be covered […] »
